title: Mix of T cards for trade/sale
author: Mikehealer

posts.post_title: Mix of T cards for trade/sale
posts.post_content:
I am looking to trade the cards in the following link for Johnny Evers cards I  
want. If you have something you think I might be interested in let me know.
I would also consider selling, so if you are interested in purchasing feel free to 
make an offer.

[url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url]

Link to cards [url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/hoft206/mycollection[/url]

Thanks
Mike

posts.post_title: My great, great uncle twice removed???
posts.post_content:
I have four Evers cards that wouldn't even be a fair trade for one corner of your Ramly Burkett card.  I have not been able to establish a relationship with Jesse, but was able to see his personal files at Cooperstown because of my last name.  I wish my pockets were deep enough to make a reasonable offer.

Frank
I didn't receive your email Kevin.
